CHANNEL
STUDIOS—UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON
TRANSMITTER—EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
KCTS-TV
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
September 28, 1961
William G. Harley
NAEB
Washington, D. C.
Dear Bill:
I am most pleased with EDUCATIONAL RADIO - TV.
The first issue is a highly respectable
publication and one that will reflect credit
on the Association.
My compliments to Betty McKenzie, Betty
Mcllvane and Harold Hill for a fine job.
I liked your article, too, sir.
” ds,
Loren B. Stone
Manager KCTS-TV
Chairman NAEB TV Board
OCT 2 196}
